content:
Milfy Day [v0.8.9] [Red Lighthouse] Overview Milfy Day is a visual novel game, you’ll play as a young man who has just moved into this small town. You’re staying with two hot mature women and their families. Because your family is going through a crisis, you need to revive your family, meet more local residents, help them and discover the secrets of the town. Of course the most important thing is that you have to successfully graduate and find a partner at the school prom.​ 游戏介绍 游戏类型 《Milfy Day》——基于Illusion（i社）Honey Select 2引擎与Ren’py引擎制作的亚洲风视觉小说（AVN）游戏 版本信息 当前版本:0.8.9 原版首发日: 2025-10-16 汉化分享日: 2025-10-26 Changelog(更新日志) New Angelina content. New Zoey content. New Syndra content. A new girl. New dialogues. Text correction. Some renders fixes. New portraits. Bug fixes. content:
New Family [v0.4.5] [King Peanut] Overview The story begins with the main character, who lost their parents at a young age, being taken in by a new family. This new family, though not related by blood, is a small, close-knit community that relies on one another. As the main character lives and grows with them, they share in each other’s lives and experiences. The unfolding relationships within this family and the events they encounter together form the central storyline​ 游戏介绍 游戏类型 《New Family》——基于Illusion（i社）Koikatsu Sunshine引擎与Renpy引擎制作的日系视觉小说（AVN）游戏 版本信息 当前版本:0.4.5 原版首发日: 2025-10-16 汉化分享日: 2025-10-17 Changelog(更新日志) This patch includes 2 new NSFW scenes for Noah and 5 new ones for Asami. You can now work out at the gym, and if your Strength is 5 or higher, you might find Asami there at night Asami’s been around since the early builds, but I kept delaying her update for a while. Honestly, her story might be a bit divisive - some people might love it, others might not Still, since the game’s heading toward its ending, I think it’s finally time to move forward with her part. content:
City Devil: Restart [V0.4] [Sabirow] Overview In a new city, you start a fresh chapter of your life by enrolling in a high school. Embarking on this thrilling journey, you’ll encounter a diverse group of friends, including charming and beautiful girls. As you explore the town and its inhabitants, you will realize something mysterious and disturbing is happening here. Strange people and unexplained phenomena seem to haunt you. MC’s frequent nightmares add a creepy element to the story. As you interact with various characters, you will also have to make decisions that will affect the game’s outcome. Your choices will determine the course of the story and the relationships you form with other characters. 游戏介绍 游戏类型 《City Devil: Restart》——基于Illusion（i社）Honey Select 2引擎与Renpy引擎制作的亚洲风视觉小说（AVN）游戏 版本信息 当前版本:0.4 原版首发日: 2025-10-15 汉化分享日: 2025-10-17 Changelog(更新日志) 2 600+ new images 305+ new animations 24 900+ new words 19 200+ rewritten words from earlier versions 90+ new music & ambient tracks 215+ new sound effects Updated relationship screen Numerous minor improvements & fixes Developer(入正地址) Patreon Itch.io Subscribestar Discord DOWNLOAD(汉化补丁) Win/Linux(PC端) 下载文件：

Ripples [v0.8.0 Public] [Jestur] Overview Ripples is a sci-fi visual novel that centers around an 18-year-old in his last year of high school. He reunites with his good friend Darci and sets off to school like any other day, but as the day goes on, he learns new information about his deceased father that has him questioning the truth about his death.​ 游戏介绍 游戏类型 《Ripples》——基于Illusion（i社）Honey Select引擎与Renpy引擎制作的亚洲风视觉小说（AVN）游戏 版本信息 当前版本:0.8 原版首发日: 2025-07-13 汉化分享日: 2025-06-28 Changelog(更新日志) 2,216 New Images 191 New Animations (40+ Minutes Total) 6 New Gallery Scenes 50+ New Music Tracks 110+ New Sound Effects 5 New Hidden Renders Several Render Fixes Several Code Fixes Lots of Typos Fixed New UI (Thanks, Pax) New Main Menu New Replay Gallery (Hints Now Added) Fixed some older gallery scenes not playing the whole scene And Other Small Things Developer(入正地址) Patreon Itch.io Subscribestar Discord Twitter DOWNLOAD(汉化补丁) Win/Linux(PC端) 下载文件：
